description:
The year of IPV6 keeps coming. But what can it be used for now? What problems does it cause and solve? Attendees will be walked through the basics of IPV6, tunnel creation and how to use IPV6 to access otherwise unreachable resources. The IPV6 capabilities of basic packages will be discussed and explored via the use of the presenter's personal laboratory space. Additional lab issues will be demonstrated and explained!
  • IPv4
  • IPv6

Check if you are IPv6

  • icanhazip.com
  • www.sixxs.net
  • ipv6.he.net
  • test-ipv6.com
You can use curl http://icanhazip.com/ on the terminal of your server.

Setting up an IPv6 over IPv4 tunel using SixXS
